channel.title: [718] Interface Id 275 problem

item.title: [718] Interface Id 275 problem
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:2, topic:539366”]Try this ;D

if (cmd[0].equals("commands")) { if (player.getRights() == 0) { player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " "); } player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Player Commands!"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::home"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::recov recoveryquestion"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::suggest put your suggestion here"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "::report player_here reason_goes_Here"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, "::empty | empties your inventory"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "::checkMax"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, "::checkComp"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "::rules"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 19, "::ticket"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 20, "::pkranks"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 21, "::kdr"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 22, "::players"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 23, "::missions"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 24, "::female"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 25, "::male"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 26, "::help"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 27, "::donate"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 28, "::lockxp"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 29, "::hideyell"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 30, "::changepass your new password goes here"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 31, "::forums"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 32, "::vote"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 33, "::commands"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 34, "::answer"); } else if (player.getRights() == 1) { player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " "); } player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Moderator Commands!"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::color hexcolorhere"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::crown crownid"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::checkbank playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "::ipban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, "::unban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "::unmute playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, "::aura"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "::updatereason number_Here reason_here"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 19, "::ban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 20, "::jail playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 23, "::kick playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 24, "::fkick playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 25, "::hide"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 26, "::unjail playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 27, "::teleto playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 28, "::teletome playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 29, "::sendhome playername"); } else if (player.getRights() >= 2) { player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " "); } player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Admin Commands!"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::tele x y z"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::cannon"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::memory"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "::remove x y | DO NOT USE UNLESS THEDONBASE TOLD YOU TOO."); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, "::cleanhome"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "::cleannpcs"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, "::resetloyalty playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "::aggressive | makes area multicombat and makes all npcs aggressive"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 19, "::getid itemname"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 20, "::open interId"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 21, "::crown id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 22, "::item id amount"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 23, "::setspins playername amount"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 24, "::unban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 25, "::qbd"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 26, "::meeting | summons all staff members"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 27, "::restartfp | restarts fight pits"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 28, "::teletome playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 29, "::bork"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 30, "::killnpc | kills all npcs!"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 31, "::sound id effect"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 32, "::music id effect"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 33, "::removenpc id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 34, "::resetkdr"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 35, "::stopc"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 36, "::getip"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 37, "::god"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 38, "::testdung"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 39, "::checkdisplay"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 40, "::removedisplay playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 41, "::coords"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 42, "::iteminter int1 int2 int3"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 43, "::trade playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 44, "::setlevel skillid level"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 45, "::npc id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 46, "::object id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 47, "::killme"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 48, "::passother playername newpass"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 49, "::unmuteall"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 50, "::reset id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 51, "::master"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 52, "::loyaltyshop"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 53, "::tonpc id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 54, "::inter id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 55, "::empty"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 56, "::kill playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 57, "::giveitem id amount player_name"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 58, "::bank"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 59, "::check"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 60, "::reload"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 61, "::tele x y z"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 62, "::update int"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 63, "::emote id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 64, "::spec"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 65, "::unban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 66, "::ban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 67, "::ipban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 68, "::unipban playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 69, "::kiln"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 70, "::setpitswinner"); } else if (player.isDonator() || player.isExtremeDonator()) { player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " "); } player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Donator Commands!"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::roll"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::donorzone"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::trollname name"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "::title id"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, "::setdisplay newdisplayname"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "::donorcity"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, ":: resetdisplay"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "::bank"); } else if (player.isSupporter()) { player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); for (int i = 0; i < 316; i+) { player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " "); } player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Support Commands!"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::supportzone"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::sendhome"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::mute playername"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "More comming soon <3"); } return true; }[/quote]What did you exactly change? I don’t see it.

You are getting blackscreened because the interface is probably not in your cache/you are sending the packet incorrectly (perhaps different type etc.). Then subsequently logged out due to this error.

Read full topic

item.title: [718] Interface Id 275 problem
item.dc:creator: @basse747 basse747
item.description:
@basse747 wrote:

Hello, i am having a problem with interface 275, this is my current code and it pops up real quick then you get blackscreened and loggedout, how come?

if (cmd[0].equals("commands")) {
			if (player.getRights() == 0) {
			player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
			for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " ");
			}
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Player Commands!");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::home");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::recov recoveryquestion");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::suggest put your suggestion here");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "::report player_here reason_goes_Here");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, "::empty | empties your inventory");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "::checkMax");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, "::checkComp");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "::rules");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 19, "::ticket");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 20, "::pkranks");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 21, "::kdr");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 22, "::players");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 23, "::missions");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 24, "::female");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 25, "::male");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 26, "::help");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 27, "::donate");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 28, "::lockxp");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 29, "::hideyell");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 30, "::changepass your new password goes here");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 31, "::forums");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 32, "::vote");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 33, "::commands");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 34, "::answer");
			} else if (player.getRights() == 1) {
			player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
			for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " ");
			}
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Moderator Commands!");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::color hexcolorhere");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::crown crownid");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::checkbank playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 14, "::ipban playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 15, "::unban playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "::unmute playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 17, "::aura");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 18, "::updatereason number_Here reason_here");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 19, "::ban playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 20, "::jail playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 23, "::kick playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 24, "::fkick playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 25, "::hide");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 26, "::unjail playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 27, "::teleto playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 28, "::teletome playername");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 29, "::sendhome playername");
			} else if (player.getRights() >= 2) {
			player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
			for (int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, " ");
			}
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Admin Commands!");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "Commands");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "::tele x y z");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "::cannon");
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "::memory");
